text: Bárbara Allende Gil de Biedma (29 June 1957 – 24 May 2022), also known as Ouka Leele, was a Spanish photographer. Her uncle Jaime Gil de Biedma was a famous poet. She was one of the most important photographers during La Movida Madrileña. She also worked as an illustrator and written many poetry books. She was a member of the Agence VU. Leele was born in Madrid, Spain. Leele died on 24 May 2022 in Madrid at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish photographers Category:People from Madrid
title: Ouka Leele
